website_summaries.verdict: A heavy jack that's worth the money if you need a wide lift range.
pros: Can lift low sports cars and high SUVs thanks to its 2.75- to 24-inch lift range
Dual pistons get high marks for their fast-lifting abilities
cons: Rated for just 2 tons, yet it is extremely heavy
Expensive in comparison to similar models

customer_reviews.title: heaviest jack i've laid eyes on, much less used.  not pretty either.
customer_reviews.text: Its EXTREMELY heavy, even for a steel floor jack. I've used pneumatic and hydraulic floor jacks with greater capacity and they were lighter. This jack seems as well built as any consumer level jack in its capacity range. No care was given to the finish of the parts. That is, they're cut/stamped and welded with no finish grinding at all. splatters and funny angles. Ugly, but it works. Imagine its so heavy because they'd rather spend their money on shipping and over build it, than pay for qc and building it lighter. you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: B-row

customer_reviews.title: I'm a mechanic
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few floor jacks but this one is very stable, jacks up fast, and has a height extended of about 24 inches. Lots of jacks only hit 19 inches. For me this is important. It's also a very low profile so if you want to raise a car that sits low to the ground this is the jack for you. I could have spent several hundred dollars on a jack but I didn't because this one does more for me and if I get 5-8 years out of it, I'll just buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car jack.  "SHEERNESS" DOES NOT APPLY. lol
customer_reviews.text: not sure how the Amazon algorythm suggested "sheerness" review applies here. the box showed up a bit tattered but the internal protection saved the day! the jack performs admirably. able to reach jacking points on my wife's car without ramps or blocks as well as my lifted 4x4 frame. Heard about Sunnex via the Hot Rod HIPPIE YOUTUBE channel. Thank you Sir, excellent point roduct line
customer_reviews.author: TLCHopII

customer_reviews.title: headache
customer_reviews.text: I got this jack a lil over a year ago and it worked great for the first few months but then I started having issues with the right side piston that does the heavy lifting part. The rapid piston works great but the other one sticks down all the time. Its a huge pain. And as there is no warranty info listed, I stuck with a jack that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jack!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Easy up and easy down, which is what I really like! I have a '91 Chevy suburban (6100 lbs) with a diesel and this jack easily jack the truck up and will SLOWLY lower the truck back down. No jerkyness..no super fast drops that about give you a heart attack...but a nice slow decent. 1000x better than other cheap knocks that are on the market. My truck is lowered and this is the only jack I could find that would fit under the truck.
customer_reviews.author: badss213

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Low profile fits under any car. I bought to work on a 1974 Alfa Romeo Spider. The long handle makes lifting easy. I can lift the whole front end easily. The wheel clearance is very small. There's a high spot between concrete sections in my garage and the body of the jack scrapes as it passed over the high spot. Other than that, it's been great. So far, I've lifted the Alfa, Toyota Sienna, and a Nissan Altima.
customer_reviews.author: pknifeuser

customer_reviews.title: The unit is supported in a very thin cardboard box by styrofoam...both the cardboard and styrofoam looked like they were dropped from a second floor window
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jack...I had to return the first one duo to shipping damage. The Sunex jack is very well made and very heavy....the packaging leaves a lot to be desired. The unit is supported in a very thin cardboard box by styrofoam...both the cardboard and styrofoam looked like they were dropped from a second floor window. The packaging of the second unit arrived in almost the same condition as the first but fortunately the Jack was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Harold H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Jack!
customer_reviews.text: I've not put this product through the wringer as of yet but, it appears to be very well built. It fits simplistically under my SCAG mower (which is the main reason I bought it)... very easy up and a very smooth down. The only gripe to this point would not be with the product but, the packaging... it shipped in the factory box and arrived beat to heck and back. Fortunately, the product was ok but, the box looked pretty rough and had me worried when the brown truck dropped it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rockpick

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING JACK! OUTSTANDING PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely AMAZING jack! Exactly what I needed to properly service my C5 Vette! Awesome quality and performance! Outstanding price! The packaging was HORRIBLE and arrived literally shredded! If Amazon is going to continue to sell items of this weight, they have to figure out a better way to get it to the end user in one piece........
customer_reviews.author: Racerdave 14

customer_reviews.title: Low and long
customer_reviews.text: The two things it needed to be it i s...low and long, and that allows us to use on certain cars, but the jacking itself isn't very impressive. It does jack up, with with more effort than most jacks
customer_reviews.author: Keister Sunday

customer_reviews.title: Great jack!!
customer_reviews.text: Great jack!! I wanted a quality jack one that could work on lowered cars and lifted trucks. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John hess

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say about this jack except it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this jack except it is very well built and have not had any problems with it. I use it multiple times a week while I work on my project car. It fits under my car with ease, even though it is lowered. The only issue that I had was not from the jack but the box it came in. The Styrofoam that it was packed in created a huge mess while taking it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: justin hedricks

customer_reviews.title: Simply works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm out of the box, really pleased with the construction and attention to detail like grease on all moving surfaces. Only comment would be that the styrofoam packaging was destroyed and some of it was glued/stuck to the underside of the jack making it hard to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Sauraus

customer_reviews.title: Great jack! Minor amount of assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great jack! Minor amount of assembly, purge the air out of the hydraulic cylinder, and away you go. The vertical capabilities of this jack are fantastic. I bought it primarily to lift extended travel UTVs, but it also will work on full-sized vehicles and low-clearance cars.
customer_reviews.author: Dingo

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: The packaging arrived in shambles, but this jack inside is built like a tank. It works fine. I couldn't be happier. The instruction manual is well written too. In case anyone is interested, the saddle is held in place using (#10 metric Allen wrench screw) screwed into a threaded hole 7/8" in diameter and about 1/4" deep. There is a cross bar at the base of the threaded hole blocking anything that might be lowered into the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This Jack goes very low.
customer_reviews.text: Lowered my S2000 and this slides under with height to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Works smoothly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good low boy design. Has a much deeper reach than the Harbor Freight ones. Smooth pumping action and smooth release when lowering.
customer_reviews.author: BrianInAz

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 19 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jack in April of 2018, it’s now November 2019 and it has stopped working entirely. It was a great jack while it lasted but for how few times it was used I’m disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great jack
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but it is quite heavy. I bought it for the height and weight cap which are just as advertised
customer_reviews.author: MPH

customer_reviews.title: Goes from very low, to very high
customer_reviews.text: Fit's under my low clearance sedan, can lift my high clearance pickup. It just works like advertised. Sometimes that all you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bourlet François-Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Grease it when you open it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can lift my vehicle 2 feet in the air with out a block of wood and its low enough to go under just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Handler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing I have a low profile Dodge Charger and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Jordan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great jack!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I did before I had this jack. Well, I do, and it involved a bunch of blocks of wood and a jack that neither went this high nor this low. This thing is FANTASTIC for everything that I work on - which ranges from slammed drift cars to lifted Jeeps.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: THE jack to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a heavier duty jack. It's also lower profile than my old craftsman and goes almost 3 inches higher. Fast, smooth jacking action. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cmac

customer_reviews.title: nice jack
customer_reviews.text: jack is easy to set up and use.Manuverability is easy.
customer_reviews.author: John S Kalargyros

customer_reviews.title: solidly built and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Its so much easier then my bottle jack and can still get under the side exhaust ground effects with air ride.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck for a low profile jack with high raise capability
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Couture

customer_reviews.title: Worthy investment
customer_reviews.text: This jack is great, it can reach way under and get those low spots on a lowered vehicle without hassle. Still has enough height to lift my truck as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E

customer_reviews.title: This one does and it is a great jack.
customer_reviews.text: None of my jacks would fit under my 73 Corvette. This one does and it is a great jack.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D Logan

customer_reviews.title: It works great pulling engines on my air cooled Volkswagens
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! It works great pulling engines on my air cooled Volkswagens. The height range is perfect for any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great for my car which sits pretty low
customer_reviews.text: Great for my car which sits pretty low. I have used it a lot over the past month and it works great. I strongly recommend it for the DIY.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Archer

customer_reviews.title: it was an easy fix, and the unit has worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: The hardware used to hold one of the wheels on was missing. Wheel fell off when took it out of the box... However, it was an easy fix, and the unit has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: breaks after about 5 times use
customer_reviews.text: Used maybe 5 times in total and thing breaks. I was happy that I found low profile jack but this thing is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMountain

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Very nice (and heavy) unit. Works well with my lowered BMW.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jack, really like the low profile but still has a good high max lift
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brown

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have this Jack.....you definitely should!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, best Jack I've ever owned! Lifted trucks to small cars in my garage and it's all I ever use anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jack!
customer_reviews.text: Seems really well made and it has a zerk for greasing the bearings. Great range of lift! Used it to lift a F350 front end with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: M@dRiverW

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome to be able to jack up a car so easily and so securely
customer_reviews.author: Beware of Amazon they rep BAD vendors

customer_reviews.title: Best jack I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Best jack I have owned! Very heavy, don't plan on taking it with you anywhere ... you'll hurt your self lol
customer_reviews.author: Shahrukh Singh

customer_reviews.title: worked great. needed to jack up my shed so I ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great. needed to jack up my shed so I could re-position it on the concrete pad.plan to also use it to change a tire occasionally and jack up riding mower if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lowered Cars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this low profile jack for my lowered 2011 scion tc with a 2 inch drop it works perfect highly recommended for lowered cars
customer_reviews.author: Balky Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works well and fits under my MG Midget. But it HEAVY! I suppose that means that it's made for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne R Speer

customer_reviews.title: I love this jack!
customer_reviews.text: Best jack I’ve ever purchased by far. But it is a bit on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Duy

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad. One flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Jack is well built and heavy duty. Works smoothly up and down. Only reason I cant give it 5 stars is surprisingly the lift saddle is way too small. Most professional service jacks have a large saddle for stable lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product, specially for the vehicles that are very low.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jack for the money. (that's what she said) Bought this to do the rear diff fluid on my lowered car. Worked excellent. Very sturdy and built to last it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Mantequillas

customer_reviews.title: Nice jack
customer_reviews.text: Low enough to get under the sports car...and goes high enough to lift the pickup! Very well built.
customer_reviews.author: stanley steam

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality. Sturdy and stable
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Sturdy and stable. Low enough to get under a car with a collapsed air suspension or flat tire!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Brix

customer_reviews.title: If I would’ve know it was this heavy I would have bout the snap on one for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy and down come with the rubber pad .
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Car sports!
customer_reviews.text: First i hgve this a bad rating. But my mistake my phone number was incorrect so was unable to get ahold of me. I got it and it is a great jack low and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Dalton

customer_reviews.title: but that's necessary for a low profile with a reach like this.
customer_reviews.text: heavy, but that's necessary for a low profile with a reach like this.
customer_reviews.author: PowerHouse Designz

customer_reviews.title: like it may be some kind of manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.text: Lifting arm looks out of center with the base, like it may be some kind of manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jack for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great can reach to tight spots with no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Clint smith

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a very good solid product well built
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very good solid product well built. Arrived without any damage very impressed with the lifting height solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Costanza

customer_reviews.title: Great Jack
customer_reviews.text: Bought Jack for my shop ,Great Product. Jack extends very high an the low profile design works excellent !
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: but the jack was fine. Works great and pumps fast
customer_reviews.text: Well built. As others noted, the shipping box was destroyed when it arrived on my porch, but the jack was fine. Works great and pumps fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited to find a inexpensive jack that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to find a inexpensive jack that had a clearance under 3 inches, but unfortunately the jack was defective upon receipt. We tried all "troubleshooting" steps provided in the guide with no luck. The issue was that when attempting to lift (even with no weight), the jack would just fall back down. Had to return item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gopro for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Best jack I've ever owned. Love it fits under my lowered cars well. 04 sti and 01 forester. Use these at work to service struts on aircraft and they have been great for over year.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for its max lift height
customer_reviews.text: Didn't need the low pro feature, just need the max height. I still replaced the shoe and pad with a riser but works great. Meant for a solid floor.
customer_reviews.author: Warfighter OutfittersTop Contributor: Metal Detecting

product_meta.title: Sunex 6602LP 2 Ton Low Rider Steel Service Jack
product_meta.description: 2.75" min height is ultra-low and ideal for sports cars, exotic cars, and flat tires. 24" max height is versatile and lifts high enough for pick-ups and SUV's. Rapid rise technology with dual pump pistons reaches max height quickly in 6.5 pumps. 18" throw is long and reaches all lift points under vehicle. Low profile design is consistent throughout the whole chassis, allowing full reach beyond pinch welds . backed by 1 year SUNEXpress Warranty.
feature_bullets: 2.75" min height is ultra-low and ideal for sports cars, exotic cars, and flat tires
24" max height is versatile and lifts high enough for pick-ups and suv's
Rapid rise technology with dual pump pistons reaches max height quickly in 6.5 pumps
18" throw is long and reaches all lift points under vehicle
Low profile design is consistent throughout the whole chassis, allowing full reach beyond pinch welds

specifications.Included Components: Sunex 2 Ton Low Rider Steel Service Jack
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars126 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
